name: RichardDab
body:
Hi, 
 
You guys do great work, and we’d like to help simplify your message to potential customers. 
 
We’re an animation company currently working with a number of companies like yours to simplify their message through a custom video (http://libertymarketingvideos.com ). We wanted to reach out to discuss an animated video for you as well. 
 
If interested reply ASAP…We've got a few slots open to discuss your video and wish to pencil you in. 
 
Thanks, 
 
Sam Daouk 
Project Manager | Liberty Marketing Videos 
Website: http://libertymarketingvideos.com 
Phone: (226) 777-0381
